name: Memory Tools
description: Tools for storing, searching, and managing persistent memories. Includes auto-capture from conversations and auto-recall into agent context.

dbPath.description: Path to the SQLite memory database file

autoCapture.description: Enable automatic memory extraction from conversations

autoRecall.description: Enable automatic relevant memory injection into context

maxRecall.description: Maximum memories to inject per conversation turn

minScore.description: Minimum relevance score (0-1) for recalled memories
